name: factorywager-enterprise
description: ðŸš€ FactoryWager Enterprise Platform - Bun Native High-Performance Applications

http.description: HTTP client diagnostics and security commands

examples.Generic Function: function identity<T>(value: T): T { return value; }
examples.Interface vs Type:
interface User { name: string; }
type Admin = User & { role: string; };

examples.Serve with hostname: Bun.serve({ hostname: 'localhost', port: 3000, fetch(req) { return new Response('Hello'); } });
examples.SQLite Query:
const db = new Database('app.db');
const users = db.query('SELECT * FROM users WHERE active = ?').all(true);
examples.Main Path: const entryPath = Bun.main; // Current entry point
examples.Which Binary: const tscPath = Bun.which('tsc'); // Find binary in PATH
examples.Check Env:
const isDev = process.env.NODE_ENV === 'development';
const apiKey = Bun.env.API_KEY;

api.title: API Documentation
api.description: Complete REST API reference with examples

scripts.http:analyze: bun run examples/http-client-fixes.ts && bun run test-fixed-client
scripts.http:migrate: bun run examples/migrate-http-client.ts && bun run http:test
scripts.test:all: bun run test:ui-quality && bun run test:accessibility && bun run test:content-types
scripts.ci:validate: bun run standards:check && bun run test:all
scripts.index:rg: echo 'Building ripgrep index...' && rg --files --type js --type ts . | head -20
scripts.standards:check: bun run url:check && bun run lint && bun run type-check
scripts.guard:bun-first:strict: bun run lib/guards/bun-first-guard.ts lib/**/*.ts tools/**/*.ts cli/**/*.ts
scripts.wiki-gen: bun run scripts/ai-wiki-gen.ts changelog config performance
scripts.url:report: bun run scripts/url-validator.ts check && cat docs/data/url-validation-report.json
